POSTS.TITLE: Sonic Mania 3d Models
POSTS.DESCRIPTION: Sonic Mania : Sonic the Hedgehog 3D Model
POSTS.TEXT:
With the release of SEGA and Taxman's Sonic Mania, and since I have to wait a bit because the PC version is delayed, i've decided to model Sonic, Tails and Knuckles in Mania Style. This art style was designed by Tyson Hesse and was used in Archie's MegaDrive Comics and the opening animation to Sonic Mania. I am using Blender3D's sculpting and hard surface modelling tools in order to create this content!
Here is an imgur gallery featuring current progress. @BoomR59

POSTS.TITLE: Blender 3D Model: Son Goku from Dragonball Z
POSTS.TEXT: Using Blender3d and the videos listed below, I've been working on a model of Son Goku from Dragonball Z,specifically the Frieza Saga Super Saiyan Goku. I started the project after seeing ArcSys's Dragonball Fighters Z artstyle and I wanted to learn how they created a game that looks more like the anime than any previous Dragonball title!
